qa_pair_data_version.description: Version of QA pair data artifact stored in W&B.

misconception_data_version.description: Version of misconception data artifact stored in W&B.

negative_sample_size.description: Number of negative samples in each row. Defaults to 10

num_folds.description: Number of folds to use for cross-validation. Default is 5.

batch_size.description: Batch size for training. Default is 16.

num_workers.description: Number of workers to use for data loading. Default is 4.

question_max_length.description: Maximum length of the question. Default is 512.

misconception_max_length.description: Maximum length of the misconception. Default is 64.
